name: File Restoration Utility
changelog:
8.15:
 • Fixed bug where the dock tile badge would try to divide by zero.

8.14:
 • Updated to display progress on dock icon.
 • Updater Script is now standalone and localized.
 • Fixed layout bug of release notes to replace newlines correctly.

8.13:
 • New updated software updater script can read and display release notes.
 • Fixed bug where apple quarantined files would not get processed before quitting.
longDescription:
Repair Apps, Files and Folders


Drag and drop anything from Finder to make it like new!

Fixes most damaged files and apps that can't be opened.


Clear Icons, Fix Folder Layout and more!


Replaces files, folders and apps with fresh new ones using the data of the original.

This ensures that no data is lost in the process.
